title: Gold IV Support looking for flex team
body:
im currently Gold IV in solo/duo, however my flex is currently silver 1 (i made the mistake of doing my placement games with bronze players), so i can currently join silver/gold teams in flex.

i do play mid lane in solo/duo, with secondary support, but im looking to move away from mid lane when i have a team i can rely on.

i do own every champ if i need to swap and have more than enough IP to get any future champs also.

main supports i play are, in no particular order: janna, rakan, bard, sona, thresh
i would be happy to pick up another support if requested also.

add me in game for more info.
Zami
